snippet: Stocks lost ground on Thursday, weighed down by Exxon Mobil and retailers.
abstract: Stock market moves little ahead of December employment report, which may provide clues on when Federal Reserve will further reduce its economic stimulus efforts.
lead_paragraph: Stocks lost ground on Thursday, weighed down by Exxon Mobil and retailers.

headline.main: Little Change in Market on Eve of Jobs Report
headline.print_headline: Little Change in Market On Eve of Jobs Report
